programme.title: Righteous Kill
programme.desc: Two veteran detectives hunt a vigilante whose crimes resemble those of a killer they put behind bars long ago.

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: A death-row inmate from a Central American jail is among the prisoners taken to a remote island for a to-the-death match broadcast live over the Internet.

programme.title: The Condemned 2
programme.desc: A former bounty hunter (Randy Orton) lands in a tournament where convicts fight to the death for an online audience.

programme.title: Firewalker
programme.desc: Two guys (Chuck Norris, Louis Gossett Jr.) and a girl (Melody Anderson) brave jungle hazards to find an Aztec temple filled with gold.

programme.title: Fled
programme.desc: Escaped convicts (Laurence Fishburne, Stephen Baldwin) fight while they evade authorities seeking a computer disk on Cuban mobsters.

programme.title: Vampiro Unleashed
programme.desc: NALIP executive director Ben Lopez talks about learning from previous generations to make one's artistic work relevant in the present.

programme.title: Men of War
programme.desc: A retired special operations soldier leads a team of mercenaries to an island in the South China Sea to obtain mining rights from the indigenous population.

programme.title: Masters of the Universe
programme.desc: Warrior He-Man (Dolph Lundgren) and his sidekicks seek a cosmic key to free a sorceress from Skeletor (Frank Langella).

programme.title: Bent
programme.desc: A discredited former cop connects a murder case to an elaborate conspiracy involving high-stakes treason.

programme.title: Righteous Kill
programme.desc: Two veteran detectives hunt a vigilante whose crimes resemble those of a killer they put behind bars long ago.

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: A death-row inmate from a Central American jail is among the prisoners taken to a remote island for a to-the-death match broadcast live over the Internet.

programme.title: The Condemned 2
programme.desc: A former bounty hunter (Randy Orton) lands in a tournament where convicts fight to the death for an online audience.

programme.title: JCVD
programme.desc: Weary action star Jean-Claude Van Damme (Jean-Claude Van Damme) returns to Belgium to find relief from his troubles but instead stumbles into a bank robbery.

programme.title: Hotel Artemis
programme.desc: As rioting rocks Los Angeles in the year 2028, an arms dealer, a French assassin, disgruntled thieves and an injured cop make their way to Hotel Artemis -- a members-only hospital for criminals that's operated by a high-tech healer called the Nurse.

programme.title: The Cabin in the Woods
programme.desc: Two unseen scientists manipulate the gory goings-on at a backwoods cabin inhabited by a group of unsuspecting college friends (Kristen Connolly, Chris Hemsworth, Anna Hutchison).
